channel.title: Chaos on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Chaos on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: June Dmitry Brushray 24 Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks June 2024. Lord Krios the Siegebreaker Had a chance recently to paint some more chaos terminators. This time is a terminator chaos lord of a custom warband. He’s a former Iron Warrior that joined a Word Bearers warband called the Doomed. The image was painted from miniature reference: https://www.instagram.com/p/CwSXAkUtRiV/ And more description taken from there: Poliorkitikos Krios, a former Iron Warrior who joined the ranks of The Doomed warband, has rapidly risen through the command structure when the warband found its combat doctrine lacking in battles of attrition.

item.title: November 23 Dmitry Brushray Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks November 2023. I keep painting chaos space marines. This guy has pretty unusual and bright colour scheme. He’s a chaos champion for a warband called the Reproached Hollows, He’s only known as “The Cyclopes” Special thanks to Littlerevy and her miniature reference: https://instagram.com/littlerevy?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA== Roman warrior, short personal work, a painting study In this personal work called “Lady Victory” I was inspired by knights and medieval, fantasy vibes.

item.title: The Daemonastrolabium of the Iron Maw
item.description: Hey everyone! Today is a special artwork on Warhammer40k here. We keep expanding lore of the Iron Butchers warband: Make sure to check their instagram: https://www.instagram.com/enter.the.butcher/ If you may remember I painted a star ship for this warband, the Iron Maw, on which they crusade the Galaxy: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/g00LWe This artwork shows a pretty special part of this ship called The Daemonastrolabium. Basically it’s a huge compass which navigates the warp.

item.title: October 23 Dmitry Brushray Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks October 2023. Decided to paint some skeletons One part Sepulchral Guard, one part Son of Velmorn. This time I was inspired by the miniature (Venomcrawler) of this monster and painted the fan art of the creature in its den in Nurgle style. Also a few figure studies I turned into magicians. #brushray #artbrushray #artist #art #painting #artcommissions #buyart #fantasy #warhammer40k #Warhammer40k #WarhammerCommunity #Warhammer #WarhammerArt #Wh40k #40k #chaos #monster #Venomcrawler #nurgle #horusheresy #GeekArt #NerdArt #hobby #grimdark #TabletopGaming #gaming #SciFi #fiction #robotic #horror #spider #venom #fanart #Miniatures #painting
